snippet: Though neither party holds a lofty political seat, and despite redistricting litigation that delayed primaries, party officials are optimistic. Confident, even.
lead_paragraph: Though neither party holds a lofty political seat, and despite redistricting litigation that delayed primaries, party officials are optimistic. Confident, even.
